metadata.title: CVE-2022-0485 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the copying tool `nbdcopy` of libnbd. When performing multi-threaded copies using asynchronous nbd calls, nbdcopy was blindly treating the completion of an asynchronous command as successful, rather than checking the *error parameter. This could result in the silent creation of a corrupted destination image.

criterions.comment: libnbd package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
